body.name: FANGOR 5G WiFi Bluetooth Projector - 1080P Native 15000L HD Video Projector for Outdoor Movie Support 300" Screen, Home Theater Projector with HiFi Stereo for Smartphone, Laptop, PS4, Roku, TV Stick
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 46 mins
features: 【THE HIGHEST LEVEL 6" TFT NATIVE 1080P HD PROJECTOR】: FANGOR 402 Video Projector With Real Native 1920*1080P Resolution and the Highest level 6 "TFT panel which support 300” giant screen. This High Brightness Projector with 450ANSI, 13000 Lux and 13000:1 Contrast Ratio. It will presents the crystal clear image and the real home theater visual feelings while you’re enjoying the Hollywood blockbuster.

【WIFI PROJECTOR Android/IOS WIRELESS SYNCHRONIZATION】No Cables Needed to connect smartphones, pads or laptop. For IOS device, Open your phone's Airplay to connect projector to enjoy large screen. For android phones, Please open "MCast" in projector setting and open Miracast on android phones then connect to Miracast.

【BLUETOOTH CONNECTION & SURRAND SPEAKERS】 Build-in advanced stereo surround 2*5W speakers delivers HiFi sound quality. And you can connect your ideal Bluetooth speakers wirelessly at any time. And wide compatibility can allow the projector connect to various bluetooth speakers and headphones, get a better sound experience easily.

【WIDE COMPATIBILITY & CONVENIENT DUST REMOVAL DESIGN】FANGOR 402 1080P Video Projector is equipped with 3*HDMI, 2*USB, VGA, AV and Audio output. And it is convenient to connect with your phone, ipad, TV series etc. There is a removable dust filter on the side of the machine, which can be easily taken off to clean, and a removable cover, and the lens can be kept clean by it.

【3 YEARS WARRANTY & PROFESSIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICES】 FANGOR specializes in the production and development of projectors for 3 years, focusing on providing products and services.If you have any problem, please contact us.
body.description: Best Choice Outdoor Entertainment Smart WiFi Projector with Your Phone The Real Native 1080P Resolution: High resolution is especially important for home theater projectors. FANGOR 402 projector with Native 1920 * 1080 resolution bring you more intuitive view experience. High Brightness: With 450 ANSI & 15000L brightness, over 80% brightness on the market. 13000:1 Contrast Ratio: The high contrast ratio of 10000:1 enables FANGOR 402 projector to present clear and vivid color images.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose a Projector? Advantages of the Projectors: Customizable Screen for Massive Images, Diffuse Reflection for Eye Comfort, Compact Size and Portability(take and use it anywhere anytime), Cost Effective. Disadvantages of Projectors: The diffuse reflectance principle of projectors means that they are subject to ambient light. Why Choose FANGOR projector ？ Meets all your requirements for a high-end home video projector. Native 1080P Projector 4k Support - Restores the true color of the picture and provide clear sharpness. Our video projector also supports 4K with an HDMI cable. (Note: Some projectors claims "Support 1080P" but ≠ ‘’Native 1080P‘’) 15000Lux - Make the movie and pictures more bright , clear and bright enough even during day time! 2.4G & 5G WIFI Connetion - Fastly wireless connection with your phone and other devices with wider range, and smoother transmission than other traditonal projectors. (Screen Mirroring and Airplay ) Also Support Wired Connetion - With original USB cable, HDMI cable or AV cable ( Icluded in the parcel ) You can easily connect your phone or PC as well when the network is bad. 5.0 Bluetooth Connection - Connect with your speakers and earphones stablely and instantly if you need. Build-in Dual 2*5W HiFi speakers - Provide immersive and surrounded sound for movies! Utral large 300'' Display - Feel like at a cinema and enjoy a visual feast with your famliy and friends! Presentation of PPT/Excel/Word/PDF Directly via Screen Mirroring - Use it for work in darkness environment.

Specifications: Image Tech: 6'' LCD BIG TFT Display Optional Screen: 40"-300" Aspect Ratio: 4:3\16:9 Lamp Type: LED Lamp, 100000 Hrs Voltage: AC100-240V/50-60Hz Projection Mode: Front-Desktop, Rear, Ceiling Best Choice Outdoor Entertainment Smart WiFi Projector with Your Phone The Real Native 1080P Resolution: High resolution is especially important for home theater projectors. FANGOR 402 projector with Native 1920 * 1080 resolution bring you more intuitive view experience. High Brightness: With 450 ANSI & 15000L brightness, over 80% brightness on the market. 13000:1 Contrast Ratio: The high contrast ratio of 10000:1 enables FANGOR 402 projector to present clear and vivid color images.

Multiple Devices Compatible This outdoor projector built-in HDMI/USB/VGA/AV/Audio ports makes it easier to connect TV sticks, USB Disk, PCs, laptop, MacBooks, iOS&Andriod Phone, DVD player, PS5, Game consoles, and External Speaker. Compatible with tv stick etc. The home projector is equipped with HDMI*2/USB*2/VGA/AV/Earphone interface. 2 HDMI ports, which can be connected to TV/Chromecast at the same time. It is convenient because it doesn't require plugging into a TV with a projection HDMI terminal. *Kindly Note*: Due to copyright issues, Netflix / Disney / Hulu/ Amazon Prime Video prohibits playing movies directly from all projectors on the market. If need, please prepare a Stick of TV to connect the projector.(Not included in the package) This projector is recommended for home use for a better experience. If you need to use it in the office, please draw the curtains for better effect.

UP TO 300” MEGA SCREEN & OUTDOOR MOVIE The highest level 6" panel allows adjustment of the projection distance to change the projection screen size up to 300", and the images and sounds are beautiful, so you can get a wonderful viewing experience with stimulation. Plus, with a high-quality 100-inch projector screen, you can enjoy outdoor movies. Sometimes it's good for adults to enjoy themselves after their children have fallen asleep. TIPS :the optimum projection distance is 3.3m with 100 inches screen. HIFI BUILT-IN 2*5W SPEAKERS Featuring a built-in 2*5W powerful HIFI speaker, The projector provides powerful and clear audio, offering a true surround sound experience for movies, games, and music. Connect to various Bluetooth speakers and headphones, enjoying the excellent sound quality and louder sound without the need for a wired external speaker. HUMANIZED SIDE REMOVABLE DUST DESIGN You can remove the dust from the removal port on the bottom of the fuselage easily when there are black dots on the screen which can ensure the effect and the life of FANGOR 402 projector.

FANGOR 5G+2.4G WiFi Projector How to Use Wireless Screen Mirroring? For iOS devices: 1. Go to Homepage)> Setting)>Network)>WiFi Settings), Choose your WiFi network and connect. 2. Back Home Page)> Screen Sync)> iOS Cast). 3. On your iOS device choose connect same WiFi as projector,then launch the Screen Mirroring, select projector's iOS Cast receiver and connect. 4. Connection Succeeded and start screen mirroring. For Android devices: 1. Go to Homepage)> Setting)>Network)>WiFi Settings), Choose your WiFi network and connect. 2. Back Home Page)> Screen Sync)> Miracast). 3. On your Android device choose connect same WiFi as projector,then launch the Screen Mirroring, select projector's miracast receiver and connect. 4. Connection Succeeded and start screen mirroring. Attention: To experience 5G speeds, need both your router and network to support 5G.

Other Features of FANGOR 402N Outdoor Projector Stylish Design The appearance of this 5G projector is very stylish, and the classic black body makes it suitable for most environments and occasions. Advanced Noise Reduction System The projector has designed to prevent overheating and noise reduction, one is reducing the negative user experience caused by noise, Compared with other projectors on the market, the noise is reduced by 30% to 40%， and another is to ensure that the projector temperature is within a safe range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had a t.v stand on wheels so I jacked up to the highest level and placed the projector on it.Made this my room t.v.Works great.Even with light in my room the visual quality is still good. After I figured out how to use the wheel to tilt the image and also focus it, it worked out well.Great purchase. Thinking about getting one for my kids room, but I have to get something to hang it from the ceiling first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and quality
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughters room for Christmas so she can connect her samsung to it and she loves it! Comes with remote and good detailed instructions on how to use it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super clear and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This was on sale so I bought it to use in my living room. It works great and is super simple to get working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very impressive, at first. Problems arise shortly
reviews.reviewText: I've got nothing but good things to say about this beast of a projector.The initial setup was a breeze. In less than 3 minutes it was ready to go.It has a pretty good brightness peak, sharp contrast, and solid colors. It is meant to be watched in a semi-dark to a dark room for the best picture quality. The resolution is FHD 1080p.Multiple inputs, 3 HDMI, 2 USB, VGA, AV, and AUX input.Bluetooth and Wi-Fi capable.Surround speakers, which get really loud. Built-in sound setting to control bass, treble, balance, etc.Built-in filter to keep out the dust from the venting system.Included in the box are an HDMI cord, AV cords, remote control, User Manual, lens cap, power adapter, and three different plugs for different countries.Overall, this is an excellent option for the moviegoers and entertainment buffs out there. With multiple input options to connect your devices, and great audio quality.*Update*The first projector I received was defective, the keystone dial was not functioning properly, and I wasn't able to focus the entire screen, only partially focused. I have ordered a replacement, and it was working fine. Until the dial stopped working on the replacement as well. The build quality on this projector is not that good. Lack of quality control. Look somewhere else, don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars moderately satisfactory once an updated chromecast was added
reviews.reviewText: started out using an on hand 1st gen chromecast. woked ok, but included remote was practically useless. older chromecast had support issues with some streaming services, so upgraded to google tv chromecast after a week. pleasantly surprised that newer chromecast cost less than i paid for older model. interface is awesome, feels like i gained a 2nd smart tv except the projector isn't listed as an add-on device. all the google tv remote buttons work except the power button. picture is a little washed out during daylight even with curtains drawn. should the projector get listed as an add device i may increase the rating. btw, i didn't even consider using the recommended casting software because by it's own description in the play store it's annoying ad-ware. no thanks, there are more than enough annoying ads in live tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You may get a unit that is defective.
reviews.reviewText: First one had an internal issue and I am waiting on the replacement. Previous people had noted that you may get a unit (poor workmanship/quality) but it appears product may be okay if I get a good replacement unit. I will say the focus and tilt adjuster is not the best design. I was able to perform both functions but I had to resort to just turning the lens manually versus using the dial.I cannot attest to picture quality since 75% of my screen was not visible on the defective unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not easy to use. Cannot get it to connect to brand new laptop! Remote won’t work either.
